text.*:
Come In, World

Chapter Info

Volume:

109

Chapter:

1108

Japanese Title:

応答せよ、世界

Romanized Title:

Ōtō seyo, Sekai

Viz Title:

Come In, World

Pages:

15

Release Date:

February 26, 2024

WSJ Issue:

2024 Issue 13
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →

Chapter 1108 is titled "Come In, World".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Color Spread: A group of female characters (Nami, Robin, Uta, Tashigi, Reiju, and Hancock) hang out together drinking wine, with three golden dogs.

The color spread is an illustration for One Piece novel HEROINES volume "Colorful", which contains chapters focusing on these female characters.

Short Summary[]

Augur does not trust Caribou, but the latter mentions he can tell Blackbeard about Poseidon and Pluton. As the Marines struggle against the Pacifistas, the Vice Admirals decide to target Bonney, and Dorry and Brogy save her from one of them. Meanwhile, Saturn assumes Beast Form, and when Sanji attempts to flee with Vegapunk, Kizaru critically injures the scientist. A pre-recorded message from Vegapunk then activates inside Egghead, as it broadcasts to tell the truth about the world.

Long Summary[]

Augur holds Caribou at gunpoint as the latter begs on his knees to be spared. Augur tells Caribou that he does not trust him because lots of people are after Blackbeard’s life right now, but he insists his intentions are pure. He even tells the two that if they kill him here and now, there will be severe consequences, and when Augur inquires about them, Caribou tells him that he has information he would be willing to share with Blackbeard (that being the identity of Poseidon and the location of Pluton). Even then, he insists he can be useful to Blackbeard, leaving Augur and Devon to ponder.

The Marines, meanwhile, are unable to blast through the Pacifista’s Bubble Shields. Vice Admiral Bluegrass is frustrated that they have to destroy their greatest weapons because she knows it would be a huge blow to the Marines’ military force. Fellow Vice Admiral Hound asks if it is too late to call off the Buster Call, but his fellow Vice Admiral Guillotine refuses, saying that Dr. Vegapunk is a traitor for giving command of the Pacifista to a pirate like Bonney. Knowing that, though, the Marines decide to make it a priority to find and kill Bonney so they can regain control of the Pacifista. Deducing where she will most likely be while trying to escape, Vice Admiral Tosa reports he is in pursuit. He catches up to her but before he can kill her, he is smashed into the ground by Brogy.

The sudden appearance of the two giants surprises Bonney, Franky, and Atlas. Dorry and Brogy ask who they all are (they do not recognize Franky despite familiarizing themselves with the new members’ wanted posters) and that they came to get the crew. Franky asks if they are enemies aiming for Luffy’s life, but the two giants clarify they are his friends and offer to help however they can. Bonney asks them to help Luffy, Sanji, and Dr. Vegapunk, and Dorry and Brogy immediately head off in that direction, leaving the three to the other giants.

The other Vice Admirals note that Tosa’s line was cut off, so one of them, Pomsky, decides to head to land. Bluegrass tells Doll to get on one of the Sea Beast Weapons she is currently controlling so they can attack from sea, and she asks Doll if she has ever fought a giant before. Doll replies that she had a commanding officer who was a giant, and which turns out to have been Jaguar D. Saul.

As for Luffy’s group, Sanji asks Dr. Vegapunk how they are supposed to save him if they cannot move him. Dr. Vegapunk responds that while he did want to escape, there are things on this island he still wishes to protect, so he feels he cannot leave yet. In addition, he reveals he wanted the secret of Bonney’s command override to remain one until she became a little bit older, and now she will be hunted for the rest of her life, so he asks the Straw Hats to look after her. Sanji, however, ignores Dr. Vegapunk and focuses on how Saturn has returned and transformed into his Beast Form. Seeing his legs covered in venom, Sanji tells Luffy to dodge them, which he easily does. At the same time, Luffy tells Sanji to get Dr. Vegapunk out of here, no matter how much he complains.

Sure enough Dr. Vegapunk demands to be put down but Sanji ignores him, but Kizaru kicks him away and stabs Dr. Vegapunk with his light sword. Sanji immediately recovers and picks him up again, with Luffy telling him to get to the back entrance. Kizaru tries once again to intercept him, but Luffy grows to giant size and grabs Kizaru in his right hand and grips Saturn’s face with his left. He tells the two of them that they aren’t getting away from him as Luffy’s grip causes Kizaru to draw blood.

Sanji demands Dr. Vegapunk not die on him and wonders why he is smiling all of a sudden. Back in the lab, a message from Dr. Vegapunk starts playing, where he announces to the entire world that he is going to tell them the truth about it.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • Van Augur recognizes Caribou as a pirate, but believes him to be an assassin after Blackbeard's life.
    • Caribou tries to bargain for his life with the information he possesses about Poseidon and Pluton.
  • As the Pacifista keep destroying the Marine ships, Vice Admiral Doberman orders all Vice Admirals present to kill Bonney at any cost.
  • Vice Admiral Tosa finds and is about to kill Bonney and Franky, but is knocked out by Dorry and Brogy.
    • Dorry and Brogy introduce themselves and leave to back up Luffy and Sanji, ordering the rest of the Giant Warrior Pirates to carry the others safely to their ship.
  • Vice Admirals Bluegrass and Doll hijack a Sea Beast to attack the giants.
    • Doll reveals she served under Jaguar D. Saul over 20 years ago.
  • Saint Saturn has entered his Beast Form, and secretes a corrosive venom from his legs, proceeding to attack Luffy with them.
  • As Sanji tries to carry Vegapunk to safety, Kizaru attacks Sanji and stabs Vegapunk through the torso with Ama no Murakumo.
  • Luffy grows giant again and grabs Saturn and Kizaru, declaring that he is not going to let them escape from this.
  • As Vegapunk dies in Sanji's arms, a computer in his lab activates and broadcasts a message from Vegapunk across the entire world.
    • The message promises to reveal the full truth of the world.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


I went to a FAKE TYPE. live performance. Simply being able to hear that fast singing live was overwhelming. It was a once-in-a-lifetime experience.


FAKETYPE（フェイクタイプ）.のライブへ!!単純にあの早口を生で聴ける感動。唯一無二の迫力でした。

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

'''Chapter 1108''' is titled "Come In, World".

==Cover Page==
[[Cover Page#Color Spread|Color Spread]]: A group of female characters ([[Nami]], [[Nico Robin|Robin]], [[Uta]], [[Tashigi]], [[Vinsmoke Reiju|Reiju]], and [[Boa Hancock|Hancock]]) hang out together drinking [[Foods/Beverages#Wine|wine]], with three golden dogs.

The color spread is an illustration for [[One Piece novel HEROINES]] volume "Colorful", which contains chapters focusing on these female characters.

==Short Summary==
[[Van Augur|Augur]] does not trust [[Caribou]], but the latter mentions he can tell [[Marshall D. Teach|Blackbeard]] about [[Poseidon]] and [[Pluton]]. As the [[Marines]] struggle against the [[Pacifista]]s, the [[Vice Admiral]]s decide to target [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]], and [[Dorry]] and [[Brogy]] save her from [[Tosa|one]] of them. Meanwhile, [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]] assumes Beast Form, and when [[Sanji]] attempts to flee with [[Vegapunk]], [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] critically [[Pika Pika no Mi|injures]] the [[scientist]]. A pre-recorded message from Vegapunk then activates inside [[Egghead]], as it broadcasts to tell the truth about the [[world]].

==Long Summary==
[[Van Augur|Augur]] holds [[Caribou]] at [[Senriku|gunpoint]] as the latter begs on his knees to be spared. Augur tells Caribou that he does not trust him because lots of people are after [[Marshall D. Teach|Blackbeard]]’s life right now, but he insists his intentions are pure. He even tells the two that if they kill him here and now, there will be severe consequences, and when Augur inquires about them, Caribou tells him that he has information he would be willing to share with Blackbeard (that being the [[Shirahoshi|identity]] of [[Poseidon]] and the [[Wano Country|location]] of [[Pluton]]). Even then, he insists he can be useful to Blackbeard, leaving Augur and [[Catarina Devon|Devon]] to ponder.

The [[Marines]], meanwhile, are unable to blast through the [[Pacifista]]’s Bubble Shields. [[Vice Admiral]] [[Bluegrass]] is frustrated that they have to destroy their greatest weapons because she knows it would be a huge blow to the Marines’ military force. Fellow Vice Admiral [[Hound]] asks if it is too late to call off the [[Buster Call]], but his fellow Vice Admiral [[Guillotine]] refuses, saying that [[Vegapunk|Dr. Vegapunk]] is a traitor for giving command of the Pacifista to a [[pirate]] like [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]]. Knowing that, though, the Marines decide to make it a priority to find and kill Bonney so they can regain control of the Pacifista. Deducing where she will most likely be while trying to escape, Vice Admiral [[Tosa]] reports he is in pursuit. He catches up to her but before he can kill her, he is smashed into the ground by [[Brogy]].

The sudden appearance of the two [[giants]] surprises Bonney, [[Franky]], and [[Vegapunk/Atlas|Atlas]]. [[Dorry]] and Brogy ask who they all are (they do not recognize Franky despite familiarizing themselves with the new members’ [[Bounties#Identification|wanted posters]]) and that they came to get the [[Straw Hat Pirates|crew]]. Franky asks if they are enemies aiming for [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]]’s life, but the two giants clarify they are his friends and offer to help however they can. Bonney asks them to help Luffy, [[Sanji]], and Dr. Vegapunk, and Dorry and Brogy immediately head off in that direction, leaving the three to the [[Giant Warrior Pirates|other giants]].

The other Vice Admirals note that Tosa’s line was cut off, so one of them, [[Pomsky]], decides to head to land. Bluegrass tells [[Doll]] to get on one of the [[Sea Beast Weapons]] she is currently [[Nori Nori no Mi|controlling]] so they can attack from [[Blue Sea|sea]], and she asks Doll if she has ever fought a giant before. Doll replies that she had a commanding officer who was a giant, and which turns out to have been [[Jaguar D. Saul]].

As for Luffy’s group, Sanji asks Dr. Vegapunk how they are supposed to save him if they cannot move him. Dr. Vegapunk responds that while he did want to escape, there are things on this island he still wishes to protect, so he feels he cannot leave yet. In addition, he reveals he wanted the secret of Bonney’s command override to remain one until she became a little bit older, and now she will be hunted for the rest of her life, so he asks the Straw Hats to look after her. Sanji, however, ignores Dr. Vegapunk and focuses on how [[Jaygarcia Saturn|Saturn]] has returned and transformed into his [[Zoan#Forms|Beast Form]]. Seeing his legs covered in [[Poison|venom]], Sanji tells Luffy to dodge them, which he easily does. At the same time, Luffy tells Sanji to get Dr. Vegapunk out of here, no matter how much he complains.

Sure enough Dr. Vegapunk demands to be put down but Sanji ignores him, but [[Borsalino|Kizaru]] kicks him away and stabs Dr. Vegapunk with his [[Pika Pika no Mi|light sword]]. Sanji immediately recovers and picks him up again, with Luffy telling him to get to the back entrance. Kizaru tries once again to intercept him, but Luffy [[Gomu Gomu no Mi/Gear 5 Techniques|grows to giant size]] and grabs Kizaru in his right hand and grips Saturn’s face with his left. He tells the two of them that they aren’t getting away from him as Luffy’s grip causes Kizaru to draw blood.

Sanji demands Dr. Vegapunk not die on him and wonders why he is smiling all of a sudden. Back in the lab, a message from Dr. Vegapunk starts playing, where he announces to the entire [[world]] that he is going to tell them the truth about it.

==Quick References==
===Chapter Notes===
*[[Van Augur]] recognizes [[Caribou]] as a [[pirate]], but believes him to be an [[assassin]] after [[Marshall D. Teach|Blackbeard]]'s life.
**Caribou tries to bargain for his life with the information he possesses about [[Poseidon]] and [[Pluton]].
*As the [[Pacifista]] keep destroying the [[Marine Ships|Marine ships]], [[Vice Admiral]] [[Doberman]] orders all Vice Admirals present to kill [[Jewelry Bonney|Bonney]] at any cost.

*Vice Admirals [[Bluegrass]] and [[Doll]] [[Nori Nori no Mi|hijack]] a [[Sea Beast Weapons|Sea Beast]] to attack the [[giants]].
**Doll reveals she served under [[Jaguar D. Saul]] over 20 years ago.

*Luffy [[Gomu Gomu no Mi/Gear 5 Techniques|grows giant]] again and grabs Saturn and Kizaru, declaring that he is not going to let them escape from this.
*As Vegapunk dies in Sanji's arms, a computer in his lab activates and broadcasts a message from Vegapunk across the entire [[world]].
**The message promises to reveal the full truth of the world.
